# [Your Name] - Portfolio & Blog

This is the professional portfolio and technical blog of Ashish Kumar, a 2nd-year computer science student specializing in Next.js and modern web development.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://ashishkr.com/): Overview of my skills and featured projects.
- [Designs](https://ashishkr.com/about): A few designs (coded , non coded) that i made.
- [Projects](https://ashishkr.com/simulations): Few simulations that i made using HTML5 and javascript.
- [Posts](https://ashishkr.com/posts): Technical articles and dev logs.

## Technical Skills
- **Frameworks:** Next.js (App Router), React.
- **Languages:** JavaScript, TypeScript, [Other languages you know].
- **Tools:** Git, Vercel, Tailwind CSS.

## Recent Posts
- [My First Next.js Project](https://ashishkr.com/posts/my-first-nextjs-project): A deep dive into building my first app.
